name: Up and Up (itch)
description:
In Up and Up you guide a stray balloon until it pops from hazards! A fun and relaxing game with a cute aesthetic.

This is primarily being made for Android; once ready I'll link the Play Store page.

Controls (Until I make a tutorial)
WASD/Arrow Keys/ Joystick move the balloon
Click the buttons or press A/X on controller to Play
Hold Space bar or B/O on controller to self pop the balloon!
